roleset.name: return to an area to remove more tissue, resection again

example.name: Usually will have only arg 1
example.text: The reresection of the first eight pT1 low-risk carcinomas

roleset.note: RERESECT-V NOTES: Based on temprel data. Comparison to resect.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from reresect.01-v)
